author: JRT2010
title: Sors Bandeam
text: |apprentices=}} {{Quote|Master Skywalker, there are too many of them! What are we going to do?|Sors Bandeam's final words, to Darth Vader|Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith}} {{Quote|Master Skywalker, there are too many of them! What are we going to do?|Sors Bandeam's final words, to Darth Vader|Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith}} âˆ’ '''Sors Bandeam''' was a [[human]] [[Sexes|male]] [[youngling]] who served in the [[Jedi Order]] during the [[Clone Wars]]. After [[Supreme Chancellor]] [[Darth Sidious|Sheev Palpatine]]—secretly Darth Sidious, the [[Dark Lord of the Sith]]—issued [[Order 66]], Bandeam and fellow [[Jedi youngling|younglings]] hid in the [[Jedi High Council|Jedi Council]] [[Jedi Council Chamber|Chamber]] during the [[Attack on the Jedi Temple|attack]] on the [[Imperial Palace|Jedi Temple]]. They were discovered by [[Anakin Skywalker|Darth Vader]], who had been [[Jedi Knight]] Anakin Skywalker before turning to the [[dark side of the Force]]. Thinking that Vader was still a [[Jedi]], Bandeam asked the [[Sith Lord]] what they could do in the face of the [[clone trooper]] onslaught. Rather than help them, Vader slaughtered Bandeam and the other younglings.<ref name="Episode III" /> + '''Sors Bandeam''' was a [[Force-sensitive]] [[human]] [[Sexes|male]] [[youngling]] who served in the [[Jedi Order]] during the [[Clone Wars]]. After [[Supreme Chancellor]] [[Darth Sidious|Sheev Palpatine]]—secretly [[ Darth ]] Sidious, the [[Dark Lord of the Sith]]—issued [[Order 66]], Bandeam and fellow [[Jedi youngling|younglings]] hid in the [[Jedi High Council|Jedi Council]] [[Jedi Council Chamber|Chamber]] during the [[Attack on the Jedi Temple|attack]] on the [[Imperial Palace|Jedi Temple]]. They were discovered by [[Anakin Skywalker|Darth Vader]], who had been [[Jedi Knight]] Anakin Skywalker before turning to the [[dark side of the Force]]. Thinking that Vader was still a [[Jedi]], Bandeam asked the [[Sith Lord]] what they could do in the face of the [[clone trooper]] onslaught. Rather than help them, Vader slaughtered Bandeam and the other younglings.<ref name="Episode III" />
